author: JumpingYang001
body:
## when run Invoke-Pester test/powershell on WS2012R2, it shows below fail:

Describing Select-String
   Context String actions
Running test 'Should be called without errors' Processing  []     [+] Should be called without errors 207ms
Running test 'Should be called without error using the sls alias' Processing  []     [+] Should be called without error using the sls alias 59ms
Running test 'Should return an array data type when multiple matches are found' Processing  []     [+] Should return an array data type when multiple matches are found 50ms
Running test 'Should return the same result for the alias sls and Select-String ' Processing  []     [+] Should return the same result for the alias s ls and Select-String  64ms
Running test 'Should return an object type when one match is found' Processing  []     [+] Should return an object type when one match is found 79ms
Running test 'Should return matchinfo type' Processing  []     [+] Should return matchinfo type 75ms
Running test 'Should be called without an error using ca for casesensitive ' Processing  []     [+] Should be called without an error using ca for casesensitive  76ms
Running test 'Should use the ca alias for casesenstive' Processing  []     [+] Should use the ca alias for casesenstive 78ms
Running test 'Should only return the case sensitive match when the casesensitive switch is used' Processing  []     [+] Should only return the case sensitive match when the casesensitive switch is used 67ms
Running test 'Should accept a collection of strings from the input object' Processing  []     [+] Should accept a collection of strings from the input object 100ms
Running test 'Should return system.object when the input object switch is used on a collection' Processing  []     [+] Should return system.object when the input object switch is used on a collection 67ms
Running test 'Should return null or empty when the input object switch is used on a collection and the pattern does not exist' Processing  []     [+]Should return null or empty when the input object switch is used on a collection and the pattern does not exist 63ms
Running test 'Should return a bool type when the quiet switch is used' Processing  []     [+] Should return a bool type when the quiet switch is used76ms
Running test 'Should be true when select string returns a positive result when the quiet switch is used' Processing  []     [+] Should be true when select string returns a positive result when the quiet switch is used 65ms
Running test 'Should be empty when select string does not return a result when the quiet switch is used' Processing  []     [+] Should be empty when select string does not return a result when the quiet switch is used 55ms
Running test 'Should return an array of non matching strings when the switch of NotMatch is used and the string do not match' Processing  []     [+] Should return an array of non matching strings when the switch of NotMatch is used and the string do not match 52ms
Running test 'Should return the same as NotMatch' Processing  []     [+] Should return the same as NotMatch 66ms
   Context Filesytem actions
Running test 'Should return an object when a match is found is the file on only one line' Processing  []     [+] Should return an object when a matchis found is the file on only one line 272ms
Running test 'Should return an array when a match is found is the file on several lines' Processing  []     [+] Should return an array when a match is found is the file on several lines 82ms
Running test 'Should return the name of the file and the string that 'string' is found if there is only one lines that has a match' Processing  [] [+] Should return the name of the file and the string that 'string' is found if there is only one lines that has a match 71ms
Running test 'Should return all strings where 'second' is found in testfile1 if there is only one lines that has a match' Processing  []     [+] Should return all strings where 'second' is found in testfile1 if there is only one lines that has a match 71ms
Running test 'Should return all strings where 'in' is found in testfile1 pattern switch is not required' Processing  []     [+] Should return all strings where 'in' is found in testfile1 pattern switch is not required 98ms
Running test 'Should return empty because 'for' is not  found in testfile1 ' Processing  []     [+] Should return empty because 'for' is not  found in testfile1  59ms
Running test 'Should return the third line in testfile1 and the lines above and below it ' Processing  []     [+] Should return the third line in testfile1 and the lines above and below it  69ms
Running test 'Should return the number of matches for 'is' in textfile1 ' Processing  []     [+] Should return the number of matches for 'is' in textfile1  74ms
**Running test 'Should return the third line in testfile1 when a relative path is used' Processing  []     [-] Should return the third line in testfile1 when a relative path is used 97ms
      ItemNotFoundException: Cannot find path 'C:\Users\scxsvc\AppData\Local\Users\scxsvc\AppData\Local\Temp\ee59f5c6-fe09-4371-a18e-c3acd5bdeab3\testfile1.txt' because it does not exist.
      at <ScriptBlock>, C:\workspace\PowerShell\test\powershell\Select-String.Tests.ps1: line 162**

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Does this reproduce consistently? We don't see this happen on AppVeyor, perhaps it was a fluke.

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: @andschwa yes, it is a fluke, I use latest repository, it not repro now.

title: Pester test failed on windows server 2012 R2 with ItemNotFoundException
